name: Dognap
description:
Dognap is a 2d, top-down, short adventure game about rescuing your siblings from the traps of a mysterious enemy.

Developed in 2 weeks for LOWREZJAM 2021!

INSTRUCTIONS

  • Rescue your siblings!
  • The game is won once you have rescued 3/3 puppies.

CONTROLS

  • W: Move Up
  • A: Move Left
  • S: Move Down
  • D: Move Right
  • SPACE: Advance Dialogue
  • F: Interact

CREDITS

  • Programming: Lukas Vaiciunas
  • Art, animations, and sprite sheets: Lukas Vaiciunas
  • Sound effects: JDWasabi
  • Music: Jordan Ottesen

After downloading, extract the game's files and run "Dognap.exe" to launch!

Note: If the x64 version does not launch, please try the x86 version.
